sourcesContent:
import { Box, Collapse,useDisclosure, Input, InputGroup,Flex,Text,Spacer, InputLeftElement,Image } from '@chakra-ui/react'
import React from 'react'
import Tip from '../Assets/Images/Tip.svg'
import DetailedBill from './DetailedBill'
const SpecialInstructions = () => {
  const { isOpen, onToggle } = useDisclosure()
  const [tipAmount, setTipAmount] = React.useState(0)

  return (
   <>
     <Box bg="white" h="31%" mb="5px" mt="5px" ><Text textAlign="center" pt="20px" pb="10px" onClick={onToggle} variant="mutedCart" >Any special instructions for the chef?</Text>
          <Collapse in={isOpen} animateOpacity>
            <Input
            w="50%"
              mr="4"
              m="4"
              placeholder="Write.."
              rounded="md"
              shadow="md"
            />
          </Collapse>
        </Box>
       
   </>
  )
}

export default SpecialInstructions
